formulas.name: FlowErrorMessage
formulas.expression: MID( {!$Flow.FaultMessage}, FIND('FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: ', {!$Flow.FaultMessage} )+34, ( LEN({!$Flow.FaultMessage} ) - (FIND('FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: ', {!$Flow.FaultMessage} )+34) ) - ( LEN({!$Flow.FaultMessage} ) - FIND('. You can look up ExceptionCode', {!$Flow.FaultMessage} ) ) )

recordLookups.name: Get_Inventory_Item_Master_Based_on_User_Selection
recordLookups.label: Get Inventory Item Master Based on User Selection

value.stringValue: Id NOT IN (select rstk__rtrouthdr_item__c from rstk__rtrouthdr__c where rstk__rtrouthdr_site__c = '{!Routing_Master.rstk__rtrouthdr_site__r.Id}')

fields.name: RoutingMasterDisplayMessage
fields.fieldText:
Routing Master has been cloned successfully. Click on the below link to navigate to newly cloned Routing Master.

{!Routing_Master_Name.Name}
